document.discussion_title: Rainy weather hampering Louisiana flood clean-up
document.topic_text: Home » News » Rainy weather hampering Louisiana flood clean-up Rainy weather hampering Louisiana flood clean-up Submitted: 08/22/2016 - 2:21am Severe thunderstorms moved thru the Deep South sunday, hindering the massive recovery operations following historic floods. Last week, at least 13 people were killed and 60,000 homes were damaged. Manuel Bojorquez has a report on the latest developments. Share:
